comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. George Muzahim:

text.language: Gewrgioc piremzahim: e~tafsep hannis] n~qici: eybe pefmei m~P,#c#: af[i n~]metmarturia~.
George Muzahim: who accepted great sufferings: because of his love for Christ: He received martyrdom.

language.div: George Muzahim terima derita yang besar karena kasihnya pada Kristus sehingga terima mahkota martir.

text.language: مار جرجس المزاحم الذي قبل أتعاباً كثيرة من أجل محبته للمسيح وأخذ إكليل الشهادة.
Pefiwt ne oulamit/c pe: af[i tefmau n~,~ba m~moc: je n~yoc ou,~rictianoc te: ac]c~bw naf n~nis] n~aret/.
His father was a Pagan: He took his mother against her will: because she was a Christian: She taught him great virtues.

language.div: Ayahnya adalah penyembah berhala: yang ambil ibunya dengan paksa: meski ibunya seorang Kristen: Namun sang ibu ajarkan kepadanya banyak kebajikan besar.

text.language: والده كان حنيفياً تزوج أمه عنوة ولأنها كانت مسيحية علمته الفضائل العظيمة.
Afouws n~tefer,~rictianoc: af,w n~neni~ri n~nilamit/c: pefiwt afwrk n~tefqoybef: afvwt afqici n~tef[iwmc.
He desired to become Christian: He left his father’s religion: His father swore to kill him: so he fled and suffered to be baptized.

language.div: Ia rindu menjadi orang Kristen: Lalu tinggalkan agama ayahnya. Ayahnya bersumpah 'kan membunuhnya, maka ia melarikan diri dan berjuang agar dapat dibaptis.

text.language: أراد أن يكون مسيحياُ وترك أعمال دين أبيه حلف أبوه أن يقتله هرب وتعب لكي يعمد.
Af[i c~himi n~ouseri n~ou/b: acy~ref[i m~piwmc m~m/i: afsep nibacanoc nem tefc~himi: je afouwnh qen P,#c# e~bol.
He took a priest’s daughter as a wife: who directed him to the true baptism: He received tortures with his wife: because he manifested Christ.

language.div: Ia menikahi putri seorang imam, yang tuntun dia kepada baptisan yang benar. Ia pun terima siksaan bersama istrinya karena ia mengakui Kristus dengan berani.

text.language: تزوج إبنة كاهن جعلته ينال العماد الحقيقي قبل العذابات مع زوجته لأنه اعترف بالمسيح.
><ere naf auveq tefa~ve: auvetvwtf afermarturoc: pi,~rwm m~pef]ywbs n~q/tf: afma] e~p~w~ou m~p~ounof.
Hail to him who was beheaded: cut in pieces, he was martyred: Fire did not affect him: he received joyful glory.

language.div: Salam baginya yang dipenggal kepalanya: tubuhnya dicincang dan mati martir: Api tidak melukainya: ia terima kemuliaan penuh sukacita.

text.language: السلام له شقوا رأسه وقطعوه فصار شهيداً والنار لم تؤثر فيه ونال مجد النعيم.
